articles.title: UP Diliman grad tops metallurgical engineers licensure exam
articles.description: A graduate of the University of the Philippines - Diliman achieved the highest score in the computer-based metallurgical engineers licensure exam held earlier this month.
articles.content:
A graduate of the University of the Philippines - Diliman achieved the highest score in the computer-based metallurgical engineers licensure exam held earlier this month, the Professional Regulation Commission said.

articles.title: Mayo stroke patients encouraged to join Irish Heart Foundation webinar series
articles.content:
Stroke patients in Mayo are being encouraged to join a series of free talks designed to support their recovery.

articles.title: PM Shehbaz to embark on 2-day visit to Saudi Arabia for Future Investment Initiative
articles.description: Conference will focus on global investments aimed at addressing major issues such as AI, robotics, education, energy, space, finance, and healthcare.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will visit Saudi Arabia to attend the 8th Edition of the Future Investment Initiative (FII) being held in Riyadh from 29 to 30 October, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said in a statement on Monday.

articles.title: Volkswagen to shut three factories, axe jobs and cut pay by 10%, says union
articles.description: German carmaker warns of stagnation in the European sector amid news of deeper-than-expected action
articles.content:
German carmaker Volkswagen is planning to shut at least three factories in its home country, lay off thousands of workers and cut pay by 10%, according to the company’s union.
The deeper-than-expected cuts come as the company faces weak sales and slo... [3376 chars]

articles.description: Recent releases like Terrifier 3 show that the business of scaring cinema audiences is in rude health. But such horror flicks are standing on the blood-soaked shoulders of giants

articles.title: 'We've simply given it our all': Well-known rural Cork pub to close after nearly 40 years
articles.description: The family who own Blair's Inn in Blarney said they 'haven’t taken this decision lightly'
articles.content:
One of Cork’s best-known rural and award-winning pubs is to close.

articles.title: Doctor who made inappropriate MediShield Life claims has suspension cut by two months: MOH
articles.description: Dr Melissa Teo was one of six doctors taken to task in August for for making inappropriate claims. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
